name: Send a Firebase Cloud Messaging topic message/notification from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Everey time you add a new row to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will automatically send a Firebase Cloud Messaging topic message/notification.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygRVHBnDVmgFIH8mb?e=GmICXm).
